name: Christmas Stories: Enchanted Express - Collector's Edition
storyline: Your walk home to celebrate Christmas is interrupted when your little brother Hansel boards a strange Christmas train. As you rush to take him home, you quickly find this is no ordinary transport. It's a magical train and your brother's been turned into a mouse! Can you navigate the passengers' tales and help them save their Christmases, or will your brother be stuck as a mouse for good?
summary: Can you help the train's passengers save their holidays in time? Find out in Christmas Stories: Enchanted Express - Collector's Edition, an enchanting hidden-object puzzle adventure! This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won't find in the standard version. Work on a case for the Cat King in the bonus game. Revisit the festive challenges with re-playable HOPs and mini-games, and earn achievements. Search for puzzle pieces and morphing items hidden among the decorations. Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, screen savers, music, a Secret Room Quest, a strategy guide, and more!
